executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Paige Hansen pitched BAM Buckwheat Milk on Shark Tank, seeking $250,000 for 10% equity to promote a sustainable, soil-regenerative alternative to conventional plant-based milks. Despite positive feedback on her mission and product concept, all Sharks declined to invest due to early-stage traction, limited sales, and mixed reactions to the product's taste.
nextSteps: Paige plans to continue growing BAM Buckwheat Milk independently, launching with a major retailer in January which will reduce production costs by 60%.
